title: Brat’s First Ride On A BBC
description: “Have you ever seen one before princess?” His voice was soft and gentle between hard demanding kisses down along my neck and collarbone. His hands pulling roughly at my night shirt as his mouth sought out the sweet and succulent flesh beneath.   I had always been the good one. Modest, demure and most importantly pure and innocent. But all of that change the summer I turned 18 and temptation reared its oh so tempting head in the form of my very fit and seductive taboo man of the house. Now I can't stopped dreaming of this married man, and I won't be able to find any relief until I let him dominate every inch of me!  Brat's First Ride On A BBC is over 5000 words of  totally forbidden first time action for ADULTS only. Look inside for details TOO TABOO FOR AMAZON!
author: F.C. Ledger
